function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The use of face shields as an alternative to face masks may not effectively prevent the transmission of airborne particles and aerosols, leading to potential exposure to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to infectious aerosol particles, particularly for health care workers and individuals in the service industry.","Mitigation":"Encouraging the use of face shields in conjunction with face masks or coverings to provide comprehensive protection against airborne particles and aerosols.","Technologies":"Development of better fitting and more protective face shield designs to minimize the escape of aerosols.","People":"Health care workers, service industry workers, and individuals in close-contact settings.","Owner":"Government health departments, industry regulators, and employers."},{"Description":"Covering the face with masks or face shields negatively impacts the ability of hard of hearing (HoH) individuals to listen and lip-read, affecting approximately 11 million people in the UK.","Impact":"Social and communication challenges for HoH individuals, leading to potential isolation and difficulties in accessing essential services.","Mitigation":"Adapting guidance to accommodate HoH individuals through the use of clear face masks or novel technologies such as captioning apps.","Technologies":"Development of clear face masks and captioning apps to support the communication needs of HoH individuals.","People":"Hard of hearing individuals, service providers, and caregivers of HoH individuals.","Owner":"Health organizations, technology developers, and service providers."},{"Description":"Encouraging the use of face masks and coverings as a precautionary measure to mitigate the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Reduction of potential transmission of contagious diseases in public settings and close-contact situations.","Mitigation":"Promoting the adoption of face masks and coverings as a preventive measure, particularly in situations where the benefits outweigh the risks.","Technologies":"Development of comfortable and effective face masks and coverings suitable for long-term use.","People":"General public, individuals in public settings, and those with higher exposure to infectious environments.","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and public awareness campaigns."}]}
